name: Create Payment Instrument Long Address
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - https://fargate.test.payall.com/v1/payment_instruments/create

raw 
  {
  "type": "CARD",
  "association_name": "Visa",
  "holder_name": "Mildred Beier",
  "number": "4264281511112228",
  "expiration": {
    "month": "09",
    "year": "2025"
  },
  "security_code": "123",
  "billing": {
    "address": {
      "country_code": "US",
      "country_subdivision_code": "US-NY",
      "city": "New York",
      "postal_code": "33102",
      "line1": "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa"
    }
  }
}

Response:

500 - Internal Server Error 

  {"error":{"code":"INTERNAL_ERROR","message":null,"errors":null}}
